attributes.action: Reduce the government MP wages and increase wages of emergency services
attributes.additional_details:
The government should take a huge pay cut

Wages of NHS staff, firefighters and policemen should increase
attributes.background: After a long few months, the comparision between what the government has done and what our emergency services does not justify the amount of money these workers are getting.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
